home.content:
# Lecture 12: Extra Practice --- Welcome to Lecture 12. Here is a brief breakdown of today's class. #### Learning Objective --- 1. Get comfortable with JS syntax 2. Get comfortable with writing JS functions and conditionals #### Final Projects --- **REMINDER** Please bring a wireframe of your final project next Monday #### Practice Sets --- There will be NO lecture today. Only practice. Lots and lots of practice. #### [Problems 1-8: The Basics](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_1) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_1) **PURPOSE**: basic review, finger warmers.

#### [Problems 9-16: The Basics](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_2) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_2) **PURPOSE**: more challenging, use of conditionals and random number generators.

#### [Problems 17-24: Conditionals](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_3) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_3) **PURPOSE**: Conditional based problems, ups the level once more

#### [Problem 25: Calculate Grade](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/Calculate_Grade) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/Calculate_Grade) **PURPOSE**: DOM based conditional problem

#### [Problems 26-30: Random](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_4) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_4) **PURPOSE**: DOM based conditional problem

#### [Problems 31-34: Slideshow](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_6) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_6) **PURPOSE**: DOM based slideshow problem

#### [Problems 35-46: Loops](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_8) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_8) **PURPOSE**: Loops practice

#### [Problems 47-50: Objects](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_9) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_9)

#### [Problems 51-60: Objects II](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_10) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_10)

desc.content: Tons of practice problems to master concepts we've covered so far
